title: Kurdistan Commanders Fight To Protect Iraq, But Hope For Independence
teaser: The New Yorker's Dexter Filkins discusses reporting from Erbil, the capital of Iraq's Kurdistan region, a town with a Jaguar dealership and sushi restaurants. Just 30 miles away is the Islamic State.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
